reviews.text:
It‚Äôs been awhile since I‚Äôve been to Pascos and I had forgotten how amazing their pizza is. Especially love the thin crust veggie. Best pizza in the HD!

My husband said when he walked in to pick it up the person behind the counter was super nice too. Great food and great service means 5 star rating from us!

One of our favorite pizza places! If we don't feel like driving to pieology for healthy pizza we get their Veggie Combo pizza which is so delicious!  All their Pizzas are uniquely made.  My kids love their Maui wowie & meat combo.  They put generous toppings & have great deals if you sign up for their loyalty program.

Okay, so I went to this Pasco. Pizza and I got their best of their best that. They had to offer scared the lady when I went in. Didn't mean to. She was just looking like she was sleeping. Unfortunately, I'd have to say that I can get a Costco. Pizza for 10 bucks full of flavor and very large. I got theirs full of flavor cost me 30. A little smaller than Costco, I'd have to say that at the end of the day from between the 2I take the Costco app. It's just unfortunate that mom and pop places just can't. Can't You can't just can't do it. They just can't do it.Unfortunately, so I wish him all the well and I helped them all the best.But uh, for me, I'd probably never go back again

Very disappointed with this order.  Pizza took 90 minutes to get  from time we ordered at 11am
Pizza was cold crust like cardboard not enough sauce and ordered xtra cheese and definitely did not get .   Bread sticks were over cooked

The quality definitely has changed,  I use to get the baked sandwiches with the bread made in house. I've been a customer since they were in Hesperia off of main and i ave . They no longer make it the bread in house . They give a stale store bought hoggi roll . The pizza I got was plain  cheese thin crust . It was a pre made crust and tasted like a cracker . It didn't even have a crust it looked like just the inside of pizza that the kids only eat . I was definitely disappointed cuz it's pricey.  I expect better.   The customer service is good the staff is very kind . I don't blame them . Perhaps the owners fault .

recentReviews.text:
Very disappointed with this order.  Pizza took 90 minutes to get  from time we ordered at 11am
Pizza was cold crust like cardboard not enough sauce and ordered xtra cheese and definitely did not get .   Bread sticks were over cooked

recentReviews.author: Mich P.
recentReviews.text:
It‚Äôs been awhile since I‚Äôve been to Pascos and I had forgotten how amazing their pizza is. Especially love the thin crust veggie. Best pizza in the HD!

My husband said when he walked in to pick it up the person behind the counter was super nice too. Great food and great service means 5 star rating from us!

recentReviews.author: Sandra B
recentReviews.text: One of our favorite pizza places! If we don't feel like driving to pieology for healthy pizza we get their Veggie Combo pizza which is so delicious!  All their Pizzas are uniquely made.  My kids love their Maui wowie & meat combo.  They put generous toppings & have great deals if you sign up for their loyalty program.

recentReviews.author: Martin Sauceda
recentReviews.text: Okay, so I went to this Pasco. Pizza and I got their best of their best that. They had to offer scared the lady when I went in. Didn't mean to. She was just looking like she was sleeping. Unfortunately, I'd have to say that I can get a Costco. Pizza for 10 bucks full of flavor and very large. I got theirs full of flavor cost me 30. A little smaller than Costco, I'd have to say that at the end of the day from between the 2I take the Costco app. It's just unfortunate that mom and pop places just can't. Can't You can't just can't do it. They just can't do it.Unfortunately, so I wish him all the well and I helped them all the best.But uh, for me, I'd probably never go back again

recentReviews.author: Natalie Huerta
recentReviews.text: The quality definitely has changed,  I use to get the baked sandwiches with the bread made in house. I've been a customer since they were in Hesperia off of main and i ave . They no longer make it the bread in house . They give a stale store bought hoggi roll . The pizza I got was plain  cheese thin crust . It was a pre made crust and tasted like a cracker . It didn't even have a crust it looked like just the inside of pizza that the kids only eat . I was definitely disappointed cuz it's pricey.  I expect better.   The customer service is good the staff is very kind . I don't blame them . Perhaps the owners fault .

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.2/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love Pascos' uniquely made pizzas with generous toppings, such as the Veggie Combo and Maui Wowie, which are favorites among families. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
Pascos offers great deals through their loyalty program, encouraging repeat visits from customers who enjoy their pizzas. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The friendly service at Pascos, as noted by customers, enhances the overall dining experience and contributes to high ratings. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Price comparison with competitors (Costco) leading to customer loss - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Decline in product quality (pre-made crusts and store-bought rolls) - review management can address this concern
Customer disappointment with product changes and pricing - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
